com.paypal.selion.reports.reporter.runtimereport

Class RuntimeReporterHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.reports.reporter.runtimereport.RuntimeReporterHelper

  • public class RuntimeReporterHelper
extends Object
    RuntimeReportHelper will provide methods to create html file which contains information about list of test methods and configuration methods executed and there corresponding status.

      • insertTestMethod

        public void insertTestMethod(String suite,
                    String test,
                    String packages,
                    String classname,
                    org.testng.ITestResult result)
        This method is used to insert test method details based on the methods suite, test, groups and class name.
        Parameters:
        suite - - suite name of the test method.
        test - - test name of the test method.
        packages - - group name of the test method. If the test method doesn't belong to any group then we should pass null.
        classname - - class name of the test method.
        result - - ITestResult instance of the test method.

      • appendFile

        public void appendFile(File file,
              StringBuffer data)

      • insertConfigMethod

        public void insertConfigMethod(String suite,
                      String test,
                      String packages,
                      String classname,
                      org.testng.ITestResult result)
        This method is used to insert configuration method details based on the suite, test, groups and class name.
        Parameters:
        suite - - suite name of the configuration method.
        test - - test name of the configuration method.
        packages - - group name of the configuration method. If the configuration method doesn't belong to any group then we should pass null.
        classname - - class name of the configuration method.
        result - - ITestResult instance of the configuration method.

      • insertDocument

        public void insertDocument(String suite,
                  String test,
                  String packages,
                  String classname)

        Creates an element and add it as child to a parent element with tag as type
        Parameters:

        type - - tag name of the element to be created
        name - - value of name attribute of the element created.
        Returns:
        the newly created element.
